metric.description: A descriptive string key for a specific key number, such as 'Revenue' or 'Profit'.

value.description: The numerical value associated with the key with units

key_numbers.description: A collection of key numerical values mentioned in the article.

key.description: A descriptive string key for a specific growth trend, such as 'Quarterly Growth' or 'Annual Growth'.

value.description: The numerical value associated with the growth trend.

growth_trends.description: A collection of growth trend values mentioned in the article.

key.description: A descriptive string key for a specific aspect of the overall market outlook, such as 'Market Sentiment' or 'Future Projections'.

value.description: The numerical value associated with the market outlook.

overall_market_outlook.description: A collection of values related to the overall market outlook mentioned in the article.

key.description: A descriptive string key for a specific stock movement, such as 'Stock A Rise' or 'Stock B Fall'.

value.description: The numerical value associated with the stock movement.

major_stock_movements.description: A collection of major stock movements mentioned in the article.

items.description: A list of significant economic indicators mentioned in the article, such as 'Inflation Rate' or 'Unemployment Rate'.

significant_economic_indicators.description: A collection of significant economic indicators mentioned in the article.

items.description: A list of notable company-specific news items mentioned in the article, such as 'Company A's new product launch' or 'Company B's CEO resignation'.

notable_company_specific_news.description: A collection of notable company-specific news items mentioned in the article.

items.description: A list of major geopolitical events impacting financial markets.

geopolitical_events.description: A collection of geopolitical events mentioned in the article.

items.description: A list of trends specific to different industries.

industry_trends.description: A collection of industry trends mentioned in the article.

items.description: A list of significant regulatory changes impacting financial markets.

regulatory_changes.description: A collection of regulatory changes mentioned in the article.

market_sentiment.description: Overall sentiment or mood of investors and markets.

commodity.description: The name of the commodity, such as 'Oil' or 'Gold'.

commodity_prices.description: A collection of key commodity prices mentioned in the article.

currency_pair.description: The currency pair, such as 'USD/EUR' or 'USD/JPY'.

rate.description: The exchange rate for the currency pair.

currency_exchange_rates.description: A collection of major currency exchange rates mentioned in the article.

rate_name.description: The name of the interest rate, such as 'Federal Reserve Rate' or 'ECB Rate'.

rate_value.description: The value of the interest rate.

interest_rates.description: A collection of prevailing interest rates mentioned in the article.

report_summary.description: A summary of the earnings report.

corporate_earnings_reports.description: A collection of corporate earnings reports mentioned in the article.

companies_involved.description: The names of the companies involved in the merger or acquisition.

details.description: Details of the merger or acquisition.

mergers_and_acquisitions.description: A collection of notable mergers and acquisitions mentioned in the article.

items.description: A list of key technological advancements affecting financial markets.

technological_advancements.description: A collection of technological advancements mentioned in the article.

indicator.description: The name of the consumer confidence indicator, such as 'Consumer Confidence Index' or 'Retail Sales Data'.

value.description: The value of the consumer confidence indicator.

consumer_confidence.description: A collection of consumer confidence indicators mentioned in the article.

index_name.description: The name of the market index, such as 'S&P 500' or 'Dow Jones Industrial Average'.

index_value.description: The value of the market index.

market_indices.description: A collection of market indices mentioned in the article.

entity.description: The name of the entity, such as 'Country' or 'Company'.

rating.description: The credit rating given to the entity.

debt_and_credit_ratings.description: A collection of debt and credit ratings mentioned in the article.

indicator.description: The name of the employment indicator, such as 'Unemployment Rate' or 'Job Creation Numbers'.

value.description: The value of the employment indicator.

employment_data.description: A collection of employment data mentioned in the article.

indicator.description: The name of the inflation indicator, such as 'Consumer Price Index (CPI)' or 'Producer Price Index (PPI)'.

value.description: The value of the inflation indicator.

inflation_rates.description: A collection of inflation rates mentioned in the article.

company_name.description: The name of the startup or company receiving venture capital.

details.description: Details of the venture capital investment or startup activity.

venture_capital_and_startups.description: A collection of venture capital investments and startup activities mentioned in the article.

summary.description: A brief overall summary of the article.
